title: Mandatory Covid Vaccine in Greece: $114 Monthly Fine for Refusal Among Over 60s
content:
1. Mandatory Covid Vaccine in Greece: $114 Monthly Fine for Refusal Among Over 60s  Bloomberg
  2. Greece to make vaccinations for people over 60 mandatory, PM says  Reuters
  3. Greece to mandate COVID-19 vaccination for over-60s  Associated Press
  4. Greece to Fine Older Residents Who Don't Get Vaccinated  The New York Times
  5. Greece will require COVID-19 vaccines for citizens over the age of 60  CBS News
